contents:
Opinion
pee Cueiam,
The decree below is vacated, and the record remanded with instructions that the chancellor prepare a new adjudication in conformity with Pennsylvania Rules of Civil Procedure 1516-17. The parties then, if they so choose, may proceed in conformity with Rules 1518-19. Cf. Community Sports, Inc. v. Oakland Oaks, 429 Pa. 412, 240 A. 2d 491 (1968).
Costs to abide the event.
Mr. Justice Robeets took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
